metadata.title: CVE-2024-42223 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:media: dvb-frontends: tda10048: Fix integer overflowstate->xtal_hz can be up to 16M, so it can overflow a 32 bit integerwhen multiplied by pll_mfactor.Create a new 64 bit variable to hold the calculations.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-42223` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-260-generic - 4.4.0-260.294
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-260-generic - 4.4.0-260.294
